mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO transaction_history ( resAccount, transaction_date, transaction_time, resAccountOut, resAccountIn, resAfterTranBalance, description ) VALUES
( #{item.resAccount}, STR_TO_DATE(#{item.transactionDate}, '%Y%m%d'), TIME_FORMAT(#{item.transactionTime}, '%H%i%s'), #{item.resAccountOut}, #{item.resAccountIn}, #{item.resAfterTranBalance}, #{item.description} )
